comment.body:
Is it possible to add drag-and-drop for images and do you know if ZeroBlog (either your enhanced version or the default project version) plans to implement that?
It's extremely convenient to be able to create posts from the Web browser, but images (also other attachments, but images in particular as they're usually added inline) still need to be uploaded using another method.

> [fansofwang](#comment_1_17qLXXw5HAJkUYDfDeSJdP4g5YhDNbDo1R): you may want to tryhttp://127.0.0.1:43110/typeblog.bit/?Post:8:ZeroBlog+扩展:+更方便的文件上传

Thanks! (I found the page at `http://127.0.0.1:43110/typeblog.bit/?Post:8:ZeroBlog+扩展:+更方便的文件上传`, looks the same but when I click on your URL I get 404).

> [ancap](#comment_2_1FYXQGLBeNabf5jZHgP4CwzbmJSKaK4oMz): Thanks! (I found the page at http://127.0.0.1:43110/typeblog.bit/?Post:8:ZeroBlog+扩展:+更方便的文件上传, looks the same but when I click on your URL I get 404).

Weird, I tried again and now I don't get 404 when I click on your link... Please ignore my earlier comment.
